note.p: Birth: 9 Albyn Place, Edinburgh, Scotland (18 October 1863)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1931 vol 130 pp xiii-xv, plate, signed by A R
References: J D McGee, 'The Contribution of A A Campbell Swinton, FRS, to Television - A Correction' in NR 1982-83 vol 37 p 119
J D McGee, 'The Contribution of A A Campbell Swinton, FRS, to Television' in NR 1977-8 vol 32 pp 91-105
